name: brand_demographic_quintile_distribution
dataset_description: This dataset provides a detailed breakdown of brand advertising impressions across different TV types, regions, income segments, and demographic quintiles. It offers insights into the distribution of ad impressions for a specific brand over a 7-day period, allowing for analysis of targeting effectiveness and audience reach across various demographic and geographic segments.

properties.description: The type of television platform on which the ad was shown, including Linear TV (Traditional TV) and Connected TV (OTT).
The geographic region or market where the ad impressions occurred.
The demographic quintile representing the audience segment, divided into five 20% groups based on the segment type.
The type of demographic segmentation used, in this case, income-based segmentation.
The specific income range for the audience segment.
The number of ad impressions delivered to the specific audience segment and region.
The name of the brand for which the ad impressions data is collected.
The time period over which the impression data was collected, in this case, 7 days.
